UserDefinedLabel.name: UserDefinedLabel
UserDefinedLabel.description: Represents a label created by a user to help organize, track, and find records.

Color.description: Hexadecimal value of the color used to help organize the UserDefinedLabel records.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly. For example, accessed through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly. For example, accessed through a list view or related record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user or group that owns the label.

TotalAssignments.description: Calculated field. Number of related UserDefinedLabelAssignment records. Available in API version 62.0 and later.
